mapper.insert: insert into customerboard (seq, id, name, email, subject, content, secret, ref) values(seq_board.nextval, #{id}, #{name}, #{email}, #{subject}, #{content}, #{secret}, seq_board.nextval)
mapper.update: update customerboard set subject=#{subject}, content=#{content}, logtime=sysdate where seq=#{seq}
mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rn, tt. * from (select * from customerboard where ${searchOption} like '%'||#{searchBox}||'%' order by ref desc, step asc)tt) where rn >= #{startNum} and rn <= #{endNum}
select count(*) from customerboard where ${searchOption} like '%'||#{searchBox}||'%'
